text: The National Assembly of Mali is the unicameral country's legislative body of 147 voting members. Members of the National Assembly, called deputies, are elected by direct universal suffrage for a five-year term. == See also == * History of Mali * Politics of Mali * List of legislatures by country * List of presidents of the National Assembly of Mali * Legislative branch ==References== Category:Mali Category:Unicameral legislatures
title: National Assembly (Mali)
